entries.category: The Clone Relics, A fallen hero
entries.journal_entry_description: One of the troopers of the Clone Wars wants revenge for being left to die by his old commander, now a corrupt armsdealer selling imperial military material.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You've heard of an attack on a Rebel base on Dantooine that left it all but destroyed. Maybe there's some high ranking Rebels there still that would be interested in this information.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: The Rebel Alliance is furious after finding out that Morkov is behind so many of their losses. Princess Leia has asked you to get rid of him in what ever way you see fit and bring back any logs about his operation to her.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: You have Morkov's datapad, return it to Leia at the Dantooine base.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Return to Mort in the Dearic cantina on Talus and tell him what happened.
